articles.content: Thirty-five-year old Aakash Batras* world stopped at precisely 9.45 am on the third Friday in February. He was reviewing the days game with his tennis coach when he suddenly slurred, lost his speech … [+6281 chars]

articles.title: Fitness check: Insulin resistance - The Herald
articles.content:
Coach Kelly Fitness Correspondent
Insulin is a hormone that allows glucose to enter cells in the body for use as energy and also reduces blood glucose (blood sugar).
Insulin is released by the panc… [+4051 chars]
